## Example map

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```

## first 

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()


my_map
```

## Adding marker

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=39.2980803, lng=-76.5898801, 
             popup="Jeff Leek's Office")
my_map
```
